ns2:li: Ensures that all capital planning and investment requests include the resources needed to implement the information security program and documents all exceptions to this requirement;
Employs a business case/Exhibit 300/Exhibit 53 to record the resources required; and
Ensures that information security resources are available for expenditure as planned.

ns2:p.#text: Organizations may designate and empower an Investment Review Board (or similar group) to manage and provide oversight for the information security-related aspects of the capital planning and investment control process. Related controls: PM-4, SA-2.
